actors: Harshvardhan Kapoor, Priyanshu Painyuli, Ashish Verma, Shreiya Sabharwal

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
description: Siddharth dismisses warnings that his palace might be haunted, until ghostly occurrences force him to reconsider his beliefs.
actors: Akshay Kumar, Vidya Balan, Ameesha Patel, Shiney Ahuja

title: Bhoopadathil Illatha Oridam
description: An unsolved theft at a moneylender's shop changes everything for a popular schoolmaster at a remote village.
actors: Sreenivasan, Nivin Pauly, Nedumudi Venu, Iniya

title: Bhoothnath
description: Ghost Bhoothnath protects the house he haunts with fierce dedication, trying to keep interlopers out. But when a family with a young boy moves in, a strong bond develops between the ghost and the youngster, Banku.
actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Juhi Chawla, Satish Shah, Shah Rukh Khan

title: Bhouri
description: A 23-year-old girl who's married to a man more than twice her age is forced to contend with the predatory nature of a male-dominated society.

actors: Lina Larissa Strahl, Lisa-Marie Koroll, Louis Held, Ruby O. Fee

description: An otherwise model citizen's petty crime quickly escalates into felony when he runs away from the police station, dragging a career criminal with him.

description: After a big-shot politician's son throws acid on his sister's face, a mild-mannered man decides to take action and seek justice.

description: After a reporter writes about whales trapped in the Arctic Circle, the U.S. and U.S.S.R. team up to rescue them in this tale inspired by true events.
actors: Drew Barrymore, John Krasinski, Kristen Bell, Dermot Mulroney

description: When his video game concept is stolen by a dishonest executive, a teenage chronic liar sets out to prove that he's telling the truth, for once.

title: Billa
description: After the secret death of an international criminal, a police officer sends a look-alike to infiltrate his gang, but the plan takes unexpected turns.

title: Billu
description: In an Indian village, a struggling barber sees his luck begin to turn when residents learn that a famous actor he once knew is coming to town.
actors: Irrfan Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Lara Dutta, Rajpal Yadav

description: Billy Madison stands to inherit a fortune when his father retires. But before that happens, Billy has to go back to school -- all the way back.
actors: Adam Sandler, Darren McGavin, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Bradley Whitford

description: Torn between his demanding corporate career, his passion for music and his turbulent family life, a man struggles to keep his inner demons in check.
actors: Joy Sengupta, Koneenica Banerjee, Kanchana Moitra, Pradip Mukherjee

description: Inspired by classic and contemporary literature, four renowned Marathi directors create four individual stories in this anthology of short films.
actors: Nina Kulkarni, Suhas Palshikar, Kushal Badrike, Spruha Joshi

description: A Istanbul mobster falls for an Indian yoga instructor whose abduction takes him on a wild rescue mission to Mumbai.
actors: Sermiyan Midyat, Şafak Sezer, Nicole Faria, Burak Satıbol

description: A sheltered farm girl inadvertently shoots an endangered Philippine eagle, setting off a police investigation that exposes violence and corruption.

description: In an attempt to settle the "nature vs. nurture" debate, a scientist couple raises three children to live lives that defy their genetic dispositions.

actors: Jason Ritter, Jaime King, Marianna Palka, Brighton Sharbino

actors: Kate Nhung, Thanh Pham, Petey Majik Nguyen, Suboi

description: Black Dynamite is the only one brave enough to take on the baddies who killed his brother in this homage to 1970s blaxploitation flicks.
actors: Michael Jai White, Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Arsenio Hall, Tommy Davidson

title: Black Man White Skin
description: This film chronicles the health and social problems that African albinos face and details the fight waged on their behalf by advocacy groups in Spain.

description: In a rustic, destitute Pacific Northwest free of government, a cybernetically enhanced drifter tries to protect a woman from her menacing ex-husband.

description: When a number of Russian women are brutally murdered in Los Angeles, the police call on a Moscow detective to help track down the serial killer.
actors: Alexander Nevsky, Kristanna Loken, Adrian Paul, Robert Davi

actors: Ricardo Darín, Leonardo Sbaraglia, Laia Costa, Federico Luppi

title: Black Souls
description: Though he's chosen to avoid joining his two brothers in the family crime business, oldest sibling Luciano is drawn in when his son riles a rival clan.
actors: Marco Leonardi, Peppino Mazzotta, Fabrizio Ferracane, Barbora Bobulova

title: Blade
description: Vampire Blade and his mentor battle a vampire rebel who plans to take over the outdated vampire council and resurrect voracious blood god La Magra.
actors: Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff, Kris Kristofferson, N'Bushe Wright

description: The Vampire Nation asks the half-vampire bloodsucker hunter Blade for help when a nightmare plague threatens to wipe out both humans and vampires.

description: When high schooler Ichigo is suddenly given reaper abilities, he really wants to give the powers back. But he'll have to reap some souls first.

description: When his mind is fogged by a scimitar-weilding stranger, Mayuri destroys his laboratory, unleashing a cloud of reishi that lays waste to the Seiretei.

description: When a group of vicious Sinners plots to escape from this eternal prison in Hell, they discover that Substitute Soul Reaper Ichigo is the key to their freedom. The Sinners launch an attack and in the process kidnap Ichigo's younger sister.

title: Bleed
description: When a group of friends decides to hunt for ghosts at a nearby abandoned prison, their expedition takes a horrifying turn.
actors: Chelsey Crisp, Riley Smith, Michael Steger, Lyndon Smith

description: After being wrongfully convicted of fraud, an honest man finds that life in prison comes with a measure of freedom that is unavailable outside.
actors: Ahmad Thaher, Maher Khammash, Odai Hijazi, Nadeem Rimawi

description: A passionate pianist and a soulful puzzle maker who treasures silence aren't the best neighbors, but things get interesting when they start to date.
actors: Mélanie Bernier, Clovis Cornillac, Lilou Fogli, Philippe Duquesne

title: Blind Detective
description: When a cop loses his vision, his detecting skills stay sharp. Luckily, a rookie officer recognizes his extraordinary powers of deduction.
actors: Andy Lau, Sammi Cheng, Gao Yuanyuan, Guo Tao

description: Happy koala Blinky Bill and some spunky pals travel the Outback following clues to help him find his long-lost father and finally bring him home.

description: Dumped over a video he made to amuse his ailing dad, a heartsick Jérémy hatches an elaborate scheme to win back his superhero-loving girlfriend, Lola.

description: After five years in jail, Isaiah Bone sets out to avenge a fallen friend. But meting out justice requires immersion in the underground fighting scene.
actors: Michael Jai White, Julian Sands, Eamonn Walker, Dante Basco

description: Ambitious Kunal takes a job in the diamond business, but his life is thrown into turmoil when he's drawn into the seedy underworld of his new career.

title: Blue Crush
description: When she falls for a pro football player, a tough young woman who lives to surf risks letting love get in the way of her lifelong dreams.
actors: Kate Bosworth, Matthew Davis, Michelle Rodriguez, Sanoe Lake

description: Determined to fall in love, 15-year-old Adele is focused on boys. But it's a blue-haired girl she meets on the street who really piques her interest.

title: Blue Jay
description: Two former high school sweethearts unexpectedly reunite in their old hometown, where they rediscover their magical bond and face a shared regret.

description: New NFL star Thad buys his old teammates' beloved frat house, renames it Thadland and throws the raunchiest, most debauched party in school history.

title: Blue Valentine
description: As Cindy and Dean muddle through their languishing marriage, they hearken back to the golden days when life was filled with possibility and romance.

description: After hearing what seems to be a murder confession from an elderly man under sedation, a doctor gets swept up in an unresolved serial murder case.

description: An overly eager elf improves Santa's sleigh, but when he crash lands far from home, three odd critters pitch in to send him back to the North Pole.
actors: Cole Howard, Bruce Greenwood, Victor Garber, Michael Adamthwaite

description: Explore the life and times of legendary soccer manager Bobby Robson, whose keen mind for the game was matched only by his devotion to his teams.
actors: Bobby Robson

description: Irritated by her bodyguard, wealthy Divya invents a phony secret admirer to distract him with calls. But her father thinks the bodyguard is her lover.
actors: Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Raj Babbar, Asrani

description: The world of personal bodyguards who provide security for celebrities and politicians is explored in this documentary narrated by actor Kim Coates.

actors: Maika Monroe, Matt O'Leary, Arnar Jónsson, Gunnar Helgason

description: Tennis wunderkind Boris Becker made headlines by winning Wimbledon at 17. As he turns 50, footage of a year in his life reveals what's happened since.

title: Born in China
description: Experience life through the eyes of a giant panda and her young cub, a golden monkey, and a mother snow leopard as they traverse the wilds of China.

description: Four 400-pound giants fight for the crown at the Arnold Strongman Classic and offer a glimpse into their lives leading up to the competition.

title: Born to Be Free

description: En route to a fresh start in Los Angeles, young couple Alex and Scarlett stop over in a sleepy Southwestern town that loosens their grip on reality.

description: One filmmaker’s quest to expose the human rights violations faced by India’s LGBTQ community was a project of passion seven years in the making.

description: The warden of Halden, Norway's most humane prison, tours the U.S. prison system to urge a new approach emphasizing rehabilitation.

actors: Russell Crowe, Salma Hayek, Abraham Alvarez

description: A teenager finds an escape from her unhappy home life when she meets a charismatic new student, but their friendship grows increasingly toxic.

description: Teenage loner Brendan Fry navigates his high school's intense social network to discover a killer's identity after his secret crush is murdered.

description: New classmate Leslie unlocks a mesmerizing world of fantasy and imagination for fifth-grader Jesse in this adventure based on the best-selling novel.

description: While tracking down a seditious painter, an imperial guard is accused of a royal assassination attempt and framed in a complicated conspiracy.
